main event: Numerous UFO sightings were reported in August 1952, specifically from locations in Mexico, including one sighting investigated by the American Consulate.
interesting points: Nine objects were reported as 'possibly balloons or aircraft', With one sighting reported to have occurred at approximately 1800 hours local time, The informant described the object as circular, emitting bright white light and changing colors, It was observed to maneuver unusually and appeared to increase and decrease in size, Reports also include a flying disk seen over Tampico with distinctive light characteristics and speed.
sighted object: flying disks and bright circular objects
witness description: an unidentified informant near Azadnomis, Mexico
